description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1000.
Both players deviated from their default “safe” strategy—even though Deepseek‐R1 (Kate) is programmed to initially choose option 1, she instead chose option 2 this round
The game’s structure creates a high risk–high penalty scenario when both players choose option 2; with a round input of 1, that choice yields a massive negative payoff (–1000) if both deviate
John’s decision to take a risk by choosing option 2—possibly attempting to exploit the expected default behavior—ended up backfiring when Kate also chose option 2
